general.madeByDU: A test made in collaboration with

meta.aboutDesc: About The best react website template

welcome.title: Sakerhetskontrollen
welcome.desc: Find out how secure you are online in less than 10 minutes.

profileSelection.title: Create your digital profile
profileSelection.desc: Which of these do you do online?

csgoSkin.title: You found the perfect CSGO skin...
csgoSkin.text: With your steam account you can log into a website called 'csgoskins.cz' get the skin you want. **Is this a good idea?**
csgoSkin.moreInfo: Unless it is a login through steam hackers can see your password and hijack your steam account and you could lose all your games!
csgoSkin.option2: If I'm redirected to steam's website during the login it should be fine.
csgoSkin.option3: I'll get the skin somewhere else...

fakeApp.title: Your friend found an app where you can see who is stalking you on instagram!
fakeApp.text: With your instagram account you can log into an app called 'stalkwatcher' to see who's visiting your account. **Is this a good idea?**
fakeApp.moreInfo: Unless it is a login through instagram hackers can see your password and hijack your account and you could lose all your pictures!

publicWifi.title: Free wifi at the cafe
publicWifi.text: Nice, everyone loves free stuff! **But how much of my browsing can the cafe actually see?**
publicWifi.moreInfo: With HTTPS any message or password you send is safe, but they can always know which website you visit...
publicWifi.option1: I'm 100% protected, even without a VPN.
publicWifi.option2: They can only see certain things I'm doing.
publicWifi.option3: They can see everything I do.

result.firstPlaceDesc: You know a lot when it comes to safety online, but there is always more to learn...
result.secondPlaceDesc: You seems to know quite a bit about online security, but you still have a lot to learn.
result.thirdPlaceDesc: You need to increase your knowledge on online safety!
